properties.definition: a device designed to illuminate the road or to emit a light signal to other road users

properties.categories: vehicles of categories M2 and M3

properties.definition: one or more elements for visible radiation
a light source which is designed to be inserted in and removed from the holder of its device without tool
a light source which can only be replaced by replacement of the device to which this light source is fixed
an optical part of a device which is specific to that device
a light source where the element for visible radiation is one or more heated filaments producing thermal radiation
a light source where the element for visible radiation is a discharge arc producing electroluminescence/fluorescence
a light source where the element for visible radiation is one or more solid state junctions producing injection-luminescence/fluorescence
a light source module containing as light sources only LEDs
one or more components between supply and light source
an electronic light source control gear between supply and light source
an electronic light source control gear to start the arc of a gas-discharge light source

properties.purpose: improve illumination of the road ahead of the vehicle in case of fog or any similar condition of reduced visibility
make the vehicle more easily visible from the rear in dense fog

all or part of an outer lens, designed to modify or influence the propagation of light from the light source(s)
